Key Arguments: Free speech is essential to a free society and democracy.
Limiting or punishing free speech is dangerous.
Existing laws already protect people from harm.
Misinformation and disinformation can sometimes be true.
Government control over speech is politically motivated and biased.
Notable Quotes: Free speech and the right to voice or publish an opinion is integral to a free society or democracy.
